-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | funsat driver as backend for satchmo
--   
--   this driver calls funsat (download from hackage) to solve CNF-SAT
--   constraints produced by satchmo
@package satchmo-funsat
@version 1.4

module Satchmo.Solver.Funsat
solve :: SAT (Decoder a) -> IO (Maybe a)
